channel.title: Blogml on James Skemp's Test Hugo-Generated Site
channel.description: Recent content in Blogml on James Skemp's Test Hugo-Generated Site

item.title: Excellent news - the BlogML project is not dead.
item.description:
While it seemed to be near death, if not dead, at least as far as new releases, the BlogML project is not dead, and has been undergoing a number of needed changes since the end of January.

My StackOverflow question "Is the BlogML project dead, and what are some alternatives?" was answered yesterday by the project originator (one of the great things about StackOverflow, and the entire network of sites).

  • blogml project page
  • BlogML .NET project page
  • BlogML discussions

Being something that I've kept my eye on for a number of months, this is definitely something I'm keeping my eyes on.
